select ct.code_id,r.tt as total,ct.text from code_text ct left join (select o.role_id,sum(a.total) tt from user_order o left join (select sum(m.total_fee) total, m.out_trade_no from menoy_info m where type = '1'
and DATE_FORMAT(m.end_time,'%y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{btime},'%y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{etime},'%y-%m-%d')
group by m.out_trade_no) a on a.out_trade_no = o.out_trade_no where o.out_trade_no is not null and a.total > 0
and o.trade_type =#{way}
group by o.role_id )r on ct.code_id = r.role_id

select *,IFNULL((select sum(m.total_fee) from user_order a left join menoy_info m on a.out_trade_no = m.out_trade_no left join user on user.id = a.user_id WHERE user.invite_id = u.id),0) as total, (select count(m.id) from user m where m.invite_id = u.id) as people from user u where u.type in ('2') and u.invite_id =#{userId} order by CONVERT(id,SIGNED)
mapper.update: update menoy_info set type = '1' WHERE out_trade_no IN ( SELECT out_trade_no FROM user_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} )
